Lyrics: De plus en plus se renouvelle
Poetic Translation: For more and more is the renewal,

Lyrics: Ma douce dame gente et belle
Poetic Translation: My lady, sweet and noble jewel,

Lyrics: Ma volonté de vous veir.
Direct Translation: See David Wyatt's work at LiederNet Archive.
Poetic Translation: Of my desire to be with you.

Lyrics: Ce me fait le tres grant desir
Poetic Translation: This makes me want to hear what's new

Lyrics: Que j'ay de vous ouir nouvelle.
Poetic Translation: For you and yours and all you rule.

Lyrics: Ne cuidiés pas que je recelle
Poetic Translation: Do not believe I'd try to fool

Lyrics: Comme a tous jours vous estes celle
Poetic Translation: You with my secrets for your rule

Lyrics: Que je vueil de tout obeir.
Poetic Translation: Is the dominion I pursue.

Lyrics: De plus en plus se renouvelle
Poetic Translation: For more and more is the renewal,

Lyrics: Ma douce dame gente et belle
Poetic Translation: My lady, sweet and noble jewel,

Lyrics: Ma volonté de vous veir.
Poetic Translation: Of my desire to be with you.

Lyrics: Helas, se vous m'estes cruelle
Poetic Translation: Alas, if you to me are cruel,

Lyrics: J'auroie au cuer angoisse telle
Poetic Translation: The anguish in my heart will fuel

Lyrics: Que je voudroie bien morir
Poetic Translation: Hunger for death I can't subdue.

Lyrics: Mais ce seroit sans desservir
Poetic Translation: But I'd not die unless I knew

Lyrics: En soustenant vostre querelle.
Poetic Translation: My death were for your goals a tool.
